content: how do i debug the compiler when running ./x.py test path/to/my/test.rs? what executable would i provide to lldb?
What executable could I provide to lldb when trying to debug something like ./x.py test path/to/my/test.rs?
Try running ./x.py test -vvv path/to/my/test.rs. Maybe it will then show the exact command it uses.
@Kevin Tran if you pass -v to x.py it will show you the full command line it's running, which should have stage1/bin/rustc somewhere in there. Copy paste that and it should work.
